name: Math Training Game - Be A Genius!
name_original: Math Training Game - Be A Genius!
description:
You're math is stupid or smart?
Is your smart? so you can fast problem resolved by answering math questions.

Math games are cool and addictive. This game is for smart ones and improve your math skills!
Do you think that you are really good at mathematics? Check it out with this amazing program.

This is the best math trainer. All exercises are absolutely random. You can't predict the answer without solving a math problem. Difficulty grows slowly. But even very clever adult will find his weaknesses after playing this game for an hour. Everyone need to train mathematical skills. Keep your brain sharp and do it in a fun way!

The main features are as follows:

- Absolutely random expressions
- Scores, and growing difficulty system
- Great sound effects
- Work with offline
- For kindergarten and preschool
- Addition、 subtraction、multiplication and division
- Easy to use

For everyone, it's free!
